channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Hungary’s prime minister Viktor Orbán used a sprawling media empire to dominate the nation’s democracy
item.description: The government's efforts to control media have buoyed. Hungary spent the most in the whole EU—nearly $4.8 million, on political ads on platforms owned by Meta.

item.title: Ford reveals 2025 Maverick pickup with new technologies, hybrid options
item.description: Ford Motor has redesigned its small Maverick pickup truck, adding more technology, new performance and hybrid options to the vehicle.

item.title: Chemicals giant DuPont hikes guidance after earnings top estimates
Boar’s Head expands listeria outbreak recall to 7 million more pounds of deli meats made in Virginia
item.description: The new recall includes 71 products made between May 10 and July 29 under the Boar's Head and Old Country brand names.

item.title: Iran says Israel will 'pay heavy price' after death of top Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh
item.description: Iranian supreme leader Ayatollah Khamenei said in a statement that Israel "has prepared the ground for severe punishment with this action."

item.title: GE Healthcare stock tumbles as revenue falls short of expectations
Navajo Nation plans to block federal highways to stop uranium from being transported on its land
item.description: Navajo President Buu Nygren vowed to carry out the plan to enact roadblocks while the tribe develops regulations over the first major shipments of uranium ore through the reservation in years.

item.title: Trump to speak at Black journalists convention, as Harris erases his lead in polls
item.description: The event gives former President Donald Trump an opportunity to directly appeal to voters of color as he campaigns against Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: ASML shares surge on report it will be exempt from new U.S. restrictions
Despite steep 38% tariffs, Stellantis begins EV rollout in Europe under Chinese joint venture
item.description: The vehicles will be sold at 200 locations in Europe by the end of this year, more than doubling to 500 by the end of 2026.

item.title: Washington, D.C., attorney general sues StubHub, alleging deceptive pricing
item.description: The D.C. attorney general alleges StubHub adds on fees without explaining them, in a suit the comes amid a broader outcry over "junk" fees.

item.title: Microsoft and AMD earnings show that AI remains a game of optics
Secret Service acting director says he is ‘ashamed’ over Trump shooting and blames agency’s ‘failure to challenge our assumptions’
item.description: Ronald Rowe Jr. also testified that he recently visited the shooting site and laid down on the roof of the building where shots were fired in order to evaluate the gunman's line of sight during the shooting in Butler, Pa.

item.title: Check your email: U.S. government is informing millions about student loan forgiveness eligibility
item.description: The Biden administration is gearing up to try to forgive the student debt of millions of people. Eligible borrowers will soon get emails about the aid.

item.title: Microsoft’s cloud growth disappoints. Now here’s the good news from earnings.
